name: Riddled Treasure
description:
The rules are simple.

  1. Decode the scrolls
  2. Dig
  3. Discover the hidden treasure!

Controls.

(Spacebar) Dig
(Left-Click) Move
(Arrow Keys) Also move

Current condition.

There is 1 map with 3 levels so far. Let me know your thoughts about this game and if you want more maps. A brand new map will cost £24 for an artist to draw, so if you wish to donate towards that, firstly I'll enable the donation ability, and secondly, thank you so much! 

I've been learning how to make games in my spare time and this was my first serious hobby project. Enjoy!

License.

Audio files were licensed through Pond5.com. Compass image by Pexels.com.
